thread.title: Israelis fall silent for Holocaust Remembrance Day

title: Israelis fall silent for Holocaust Remembrance Day
text:
Israelis fall silent for Holocaust Remembrance Day 12:50pm BST - 00:47 
Israelis across the country pause to remember victims of the Holocaust for an annual remembrance day. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Israelis across the country pause to remember victims of the Holocaust for an annual remembrance day. Rough cut (no reporter narration). Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2IPuAr9
